costs_other_party_paragraph: We do not expect that you will have to pay another party's costs. This only tends to arise in litigation and is therefore not relevant to your matter.
insert_current_position_and_scope_of_ret: You have instructed us to review and advise you in relation to a disputed commercial debt of approximately £46,000 said to be owed in your name. Our Initial Scope is to consider the key documents and background you provide, assess the strength of your position (both in pursuing and/or defending any claim), and advise you on your legal options, likely outcomes and next steps. This will include advising you on the prospects, risks, and potential costs of taking formal action or responding to any claim in respect of this debt. We will not at this stage be drafting letters before action, issuing proceedings, or corresponding with the other party, although we can do so as a separate piece of work once you have considered our advice.
next_steps: for you to upload or send us the key documents relating to the disputed £46,000 debt, for us to review those documents and the background information you provide, and for us then to prepare and deliver written and/or telephone advice on your position and options
charges_estimate_paragraph: For the Initial Scope, our fees are estimated to be in the region of £1,800 plus VAT. This is an estimate and not a fixed fee, but our expectation is that within this budget we will be able to review the core documentation you provide and advise you on your position and options in relation to the disputed £46,000 debt. If it appears that significantly more work is required than anticipated, we will discuss this with you before incurring additional costs.
disbursements_paragraph: For this initial review and advice, we do not anticipate any significant disbursements beyond incidental costs such as photocopying or obtaining basic Companies House information, if required. If any material disbursements do become necessary, we will notify you in advance and seek your approval before incurring them.
and_or_intervals_eg_every_three_months: when appropriate as the matter progresses
insert_next_step_you_would_like_client_t: Provide us with a clear summary of the background to the disputed £46,000 debt, including how it arose and any discussions you have had with the other party.
state_why_this_step_is_important: We need to understand the factual background in order to assess your legal position and provide accurate and useful advice.
insert_consequence: we may not be able to start work on your matter or provide you with substantive advice.
describe_first_document_or_information_y: • Copies of any invoices, contracts, agreements or terms and conditions relating to the disputed £46,000 debt.
describe_second_document_or_information_: • Copies of all key correspondence with the other party about this debt (including emails, letters, WhatsApp or text messages).
describe_third_document_or_information_y: • Details of any payments made or received in relation to this debt, including bank statements or remittance advices if available.
next_stage: Initial review of documents and written/telephone advice on claim
in_total_including_vat_or_for_the_next_s: for the next steps in your matter
give_examples_of_what_your_estimate_incl: reviewing the documents you provide, considering the factual and legal position in relation to the £46,000 debt, and preparing and delivering written and/or telephone advice on your options and next steps
